data.text: &eHello there! I'm &6JackNoordhuis&r&e, proud owner of the &6CrazedCraft network&r&e. I'm the person that keeps all the servers up and running as well as providing quality updates to the entire network. You can follow me on twitter for news and updates &9@&bJackNoordhuis&e!
